attributes.action: Investigate Goverment sanctions - The effects on YOUR Pension & Investments!
attributes.additional_details:
We all wish the war would end and no one to get hurt ever!!!

However a number of UK business's had sanctions placed apon them which is directly causing financial damage to many UK citizens Personal Pensions & Investments.

Uk Goverment should be held accountable for any financial impact  thier sanctions have caused to Uk Pension Funds & Investments with all effected UK Citizens being compensated in full for any losses.
attributes.background:
To review all British business's that have sanctions placed on them during the current Russian & Ukraine conflicts.

Investigate the financial impact these sanctions have on UK Citizens Pensions and Investments and  UK Goverment to compensate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the UK sanctions regime in respect of Russia, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Sanctions have not been placed on UK businesses, so we're not sure exactly what sanctions you're concerned about.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
